setup_instructions: 3. Click 'Set up manually' instead of scanning QR code
4. Copy the SECRET KEY (not the QR code)
5. Paste the SECRET KEY into 'totp_secret' field above
6. Save this file and run the cookie extractor
example_secret: JBSWY3DPEHPK3PXP (your actual secret will be longer)
note: Keep this file secure and never share it. Delete this file if you disable 2FA.
